      • oddEvenRowFilter

        public static void oddEvenRowFilter(int plenty,
                                    int option)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        enable filters for odd,even or in a row numbers
        Parameters:
        plenty - is maximum number of even,odd or nums in a row which we want to have in every group of six
        option - define which filter will applied 1 is for even 2 for odd and 3 for nums in a row
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
